tokens for each market"},"getAccountPar((address,uint256),uint256)":{"params":{"account":"The account to query","marketId":"The market to query"},"return":"The principal account"},"getAccountWei((address,uint256),uint256)":{"params":{"account":"The account to query","marketId":"The market to query"},"return":"The token amount"},"getAdjustedAccountValues((address,uint256))":{"params":{"account":"The account to query"},"return":"The following values:                  - The supplied value of the account (adjusted for     - The current token price                   - The current market interest rate"},"getMinBorrowedValue()":{"return":"The global minimum borrow market."},"getAccountPar((address,uint256),uint256)":{"notice":"Get the principal value for a particular account and market."},"getAccountStatus((address,uint256))":{"notice":"Get the status of an account (Normal, Liquidating, or Vaporizing)."},"getAccountValues((address,uint256))":{"notice":"Get the total supplied and total borrowed value of an account."},"getAccountWei((address,uint256),uint256)":{"notice":"Get the token balance for a particular account and market."},"getAdjustedAccountValues((address,uint256))":{"notice":"Get the total supplied and total borrowed values of an account adjusted by the marginPremium of each market. Supplied values are divided by (1 + marginPremium) for each market and borrowed values are multiplied by (1 + marginPremium) for each market. Comparing these adjusted values gives the margin-ratio of the account which will be compared to the global margin-ratio when determining if the account can be liquidated."},"getEarningsRate()":{"notice":"Get the global earnings-rate variable that determines what percentage of the interest paid by borrowers gets passed-on to suppliers."},"getIsGlobalOperator(address)":{"notice":"Return true if a particular address is approved as a global operator. Such an address can act on any account as if it were the operator's own."},"getIsLocalOperator(address,address)":{"notice":"Return true if a particular address is approved as an operator for an owner's accounts. Approved operators can act on the accounts of the owner as if it were the operator's own."},"getLiquidationSpread()":{"notice":"Get the global liquidation spread. This is the spread between oracle prices that incentivizes the liquidation of risky positions."},"getLiquidationSpreadForPair(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Get the adjusted liquidation spread for some market pair. This is equal to the global liquidation spread multiplied by (1 + spreadPremium) for each of the two markets."},"getMarginRatio()":{"notice":"Get the global minimum margin-ratio that every position must maintain to prevent being liquidated."},"getMarket(uint256)":{"notice":"Get basic information about a particular market."},"getMarketCachedIndex(uint256)":{"notice":"Get the most recently cached interest index for a market."},"getMarketCurrentIndex(uint256)":{"notice":"Get the interest index for a market if it were to be updated right now."},"getMarketInterestRate(uint256)":{"notice":"Get the current borrower interest rate for a market."},"getMarketInterestSetter(uint256)":{"notice":"Get the interest-setter address for a market."},"getMarketIsClosing(uint256)":{"notice":"Return true if a particular market is in closing mode. Additional borrows cannot be taken from a market that is closing."},"getMarketMarginPremium(uint256)":{"notice":"Get the margin premium for a market. A margin premium makes it so that any positions that include the market require a higher collateralization to avoid being liquidated."},"getMarketPrice(uint256)":{"notice":"Get the price of the token for a market."},"getMarketPriceOracle(uint256)":{"notice":"Get the price oracle address for a market."},"getMarketSpreadPremium(uint256)":{"notice":"Get the spread premium for a market. A spread premium makes it so that any liquidations that include the market have a higher spread than the global default."},"getMarketTokenAddress(uint256)":{"notice":"Get the ERC20 token address for a market."},"getMarketTotalPar(uint256)":{"notice":"Get the total principal amounts (borrowed and supplied) for a market."},"getMarketWithInfo(uint256)":{"notice":"Get comprehensive information about a particular market."},"getMinBorrowedValue()":{"notice":"Get the global minimum-borrow value which is the minimum value of any new borrow on Solo."},"getNumExcessTokens(uint256)":{"notice":"Get the number of excess tokens for a market. The number of excess tokens is calculated by taking the current number of tokens held in Solo, adding the number of tokens owed to Solo by borrowers, and subtracting the number of tokens owed to suppliers by Solo."},"getNumMarkets()":{"notice":"Get the total number of markets."},"getRiskLimits()":{"notice":"Get all risk parameter limits in a single struct. ":["bzzr://40396a3a6ded6bb9fe5b5c4b0318f7518ce23c925b104f557310a3775e6e383d"]},"/home/ankit/projects/solo/contracts/protocol/lib/Interest.sol":{"keccak256":"0x657f152e3853377ea93d101e145c2f2969fb6fbde025cedd10e7ee17c8bd5c4c","urls":["bzzr://ec53ea6522f8a1ae4150e1c8718f6d7d20d1755b93f4ee6268fd67bd979fa0f9"]},"/home/ankit/projects/solo/contracts/protocol/lib/Math.sol":{"keccak256":"0x05162cffa6d5479b6555e03af67b75e63d85272a3c3d3d2630a127ffa811ba41","urls":["bzzr://0e784dccf35201ef16030ec531028252d590936d75f0200f368a7e5981046af4"]},"/home/ankit/projects/solo/contracts/protocol/lib/Monetary.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6f876a958c45fb1f2cefce1d7ee0ceb610fbe393e0040ad2d5680e0aa5536e54","urls":["bzzr://8b027c6ce5cd901a634dab7de74d617098b706d50b1c2ea0636406e021ea2815"]},"/home/ankit/projects/solo/contracts/protocol/lib/Require.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6ecb512d52bb5cb36ba26b98877240e0b23eb3310df5dc61f82c655dc974d04b","urls":["bzzr://826485117e00106f438a7e64ecc32b2c3705e02d9bd6035dbdc5f9faaa19482c"]},"/home/ankit/projects/solo/contracts/protocol/lib/Storage.sol":{"keccak256":"0x862bb5cf49dd4415b2659d2815021bb97392d3bd11a32ae2803d9f85ecc947b4","urls":["bzzr://3c48763c77cfd222a379a7be791a4341f355e76f35bc4c62e16264fa0f71f23e"]},"/home/ankit/projects/solo/contracts/protocol/lib/Time.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6523f89764a33b986f6655b5a0fb5b375103153be606b07a9fa95ceb2b93c2f6","urls":["bzzr://61ff7be71d666649cf1b78c2d9950e0d58322932e7e5f6742adbe511e864cd51"]},"/home/ankit/projects/solo/contracts/protocol/lib/Token.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7fff4d94f462515466ed263d686abb7fff9b6d6c95a28662a64a8424f5d95a23","urls":["bzzr://41bc60c90477c5ddab82a7760c652d87cce21dadb00456e028ff37b849bd13f4"]},"/home/ankit/projects/solo/contracts/protocol/lib/Types.sol":{"keccak256":"0x35c04c154e9ef818a3e1b59eb748565645864d5f8f2bc696c1f425a8ade9ab00","urls":["bzzr://8b2db9cb583f79fc2b74a70b270667f6a3bc54c3afef6a2d56e0d2ec5b8ca725"]},"openzeppelin-solidity/contracts/math/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x965012d27b4262d7a41f5028cbb30c51ebd9ecd4be8fb30380aaa7a3c64fbc8b","urls":["bzzr://41ca38f6b0fa4b77b0feec43e422cfbec48b7eb38a41edf0b85c77e8d9a296b1"]}},"version":1}

nodes.name: Getters

nodes.documentation:
Get the global minimum margin-ratio that every position must maintain to prevent being
liquidated.
     * @return  The global margin-ratio
nodes.name: getMarginRatio

nodes.documentation:
Get the global liquidation spread. This is the spread between oracle prices that incentivizes
the liquidation of risky positions.
     * @return  The global liquidation spread
nodes.name: getLiquidationSpread

nodes.documentation:
Get the global earnings-rate variable that determines what percentage of the interest paid
by borrowers gets passed-on to suppliers.
     * @return  The global earnings rate
nodes.name: getEarningsRate

nodes.documentation:
Get the global minimum-borrow value which is the minimum value of any new borrow on Solo.
     * @return  The global minimum borrow value
nodes.name: getMinBorrowedValue

nodes.documentation:
Get all risk parameters in a single struct.
     * @return  All global risk parameters
nodes.name: getRiskParams

nodes.documentation:
Get all risk parameter limits in a single struct. These are the maximum limits at which the
risk parameters can be set by the admin of Solo.
     * @return  All global risk parameter limnits
nodes.name: getRiskLimits

nodes.documentation:
Get the total number of markets.
     * @return  The number of markets
nodes.name: getNumMarkets

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Storage.State storage pointer,uint256) view returns (address)

nodes.name: getMarketTokenAddress

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Storage.State storage pointer,uint256) view returns (struct Types.TotalPar memory)

nodes.name: getMarketTotalPar

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Storage.State storage pointer,uint256) view returns (struct Interest.Index memory)

nodes.name: getMarketCachedIndex

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Storage.State storage pointer,uint256) view returns (struct Interest.Index memory)
function (struct Storage.State storage pointer,uint256,struct Interest.Index memory) view returns (struct Interest.Index memory)

nodes.name: getMarketCurrentIndex
getMarketPriceOracle
getMarketInterestSetter

nodes.documentation:
Get the margin premium for a market. A margin premium makes it so that any positions that
include the market require a higher collateralization to avoid being liquidated.
     * @param  marketId  The market to query
@return           The market's margin premium
nodes.name: getMarketMarginPremium

nodes.documentation:
Get the spread premium for a market. A spread premium makes it so that any liquidations
that include the market have a higher spread than the global default.
     * @param  marketId  The market to query
@return           The market's spread premium
nodes.name: getMarketSpreadPremium

nodes.documentation:
Return true if a particular market is in closing mode. Additional borrows cannot be taken
from a market that is closing.
     * @param  marketId  The market to query
@return           True if the market is closing
nodes.name: getMarketIsClosing

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Storage.State storage pointer,uint256) view returns (struct Monetary.Price memory)

nodes.name: getMarketPrice

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Storage.State storage pointer,uint256) view returns (struct Interest.Index memory)
function (struct Storage.State storage pointer,uint256,struct Interest.Index memory) view returns (struct Interest.Rate memory)

nodes.name: getMarketInterestRate

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Storage.State storage pointer,uint256,uint256) view returns (struct Decimal.D256 memory)

nodes.name: getLiquidationSpreadForPair
getMarket

typeDescriptions.typeString: tuple(struct Storage.Market memory,struct Interest.Index memory,struct Monetary.Price memory,struct Interest.Rate memory)

nodes.documentation:
Get comprehensive information about a particular market.
     * @param  marketId  The market to query
@return           A tuple containing the values:
                   - A Storage.Market struct with the current state of the market
                   - The current estimated interest index
                   - The current token price
                   - The current market interest rate
nodes.name: getMarketWithInfo

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Storage.State storage pointer,uint256) view returns (struct Types.Wei memory)

nodes.documentation:
Get the number of excess tokens for a market. The number of excess tokens is calculated
by taking the current number of tokens held in Solo, adding the number of tokens owed to Solo
by borrowers, and subtracting the number of tokens owed to suppliers by Solo.
     * @param  marketId  The market to query
@return           The number of excess tokens
nodes.name: getNumExcessTokens

nodes.documentation:
Get the total supplied and total borrowed value of an account.
     * @param  account  The account to query
@return          The following values:
                  - The supplied value of the account
                  - The borrowed value of the account
nodes.name: getAccountValues

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Account.Info memory,bool) view returns (struct Monetary.Value memory,struct Monetary.Value memory)

nodes.documentation:
Get the total supplied and total borrowed values of an account adjusted by the marginPremium
of each market. Supplied values are divided by (1 + marginPremium) for each market and
borrowed values are multiplied by (1 + marginPremium) for each market. Comparing these
adjusted values gives the margin-ratio of the account which will be compared to the global
margin-ratio when determining if the account can be liquidated.
     * @param  account  The account to query
@return          The following values:
                  - The supplied value of the account (adjusted for marginPremium)
                  - The borrowed value of the account (adjusted for marginPremium)
nodes.name: getAdjustedAccountValues

function (struct Account.Info memory,uint256) view returns (struct Types.Par memory)

tuple(address[] memory,struct Types.Par memory[] memory,struct Types.Wei memory[] memory)

nodes.documentation:
Get the global minimum margin-ratio that every position must maintain to prevent being
liquidated.

nodes.documentation:
Get the global liquidation spread. This is the spread between oracle prices that incentivizes
the liquidation of risky positions.

nodes.name: getLiquidationSpread

nodes.documentation:
Get the global earnings-rate variable that determines what percentage of the interest paid
by borrowers gets passed-on to suppliers.
     * @return  The global earnings rate
nodes.name: getEarningsRate

nodes.documentation:
Get the global minimum-borrow value which is the minimum value of any new borrow on Solo.
     * @return  The global minimum borrow value
nodes.name: getMinBorrowedValue

nodes.documentation:
Get all risk parameters in a single struct.
     * @return  All global risk parameters
nodes.name: getRiskParams

nodes.documentation:
Get all risk parameter limits in a single struct. These are the maximum limits at which the
risk parameters can be set by the admin of Solo.
     * @return  All global risk parameter limnits

nodes.documentation:
Get the margin premium for a market. A margin premium makes it so that any positions that
include the market require a higher collateralization to avoid being liquidated.
     * @param  marketId  The market to query

nodes.name: getMarketMarginPremium

nodes.documentation:
Get the spread premium for a market. A spread premium makes it so that any liquidations
that include the market have a higher spread than the global default.
     * @param  marketId  The market to query
@return           The market's spread premium
nodes.name: getMarketSpreadPremium

nodes.documentation:

devdoc.author: dYdX * Public read-only functions that allow transparency into the state of Solo

getAccountBalances((address,uint256)).return: The following values:                  - The ERC20 token address for each market                  - The account's principal value for each market                  - The account's (supplied or borrowed) number of tokens for each market

getAccountValues((address,uint256)).return: The following values:                  - The supplied value of the account                  - The borrowed value of the account

getAdjustedAccountValues((address,uint25.return: The following values:                  - The supplied value of the account (adjusted for marginPremium)                  - The borrowed value of the account (adjusted for marginPremium)

getIsGlobalOperator(address).return: True if operator is a global operator

getIsLocalOperator(address,address).return: True if operator is approved for owner's accounts

params.heldMarketId: The market for which the account has collateral
params.owedMarketId: The market for which the account has borrowed tokens

getMarket(uint256).return: A Storage.Market struct with the current state of the market

getMarketIsClosing(uint256).return: True if the market is closing

getMarketPrice(uint256).return: The price of each atomic unit of the token

getMarketWithInfo(uint256).return: A tuple containing the values:                   - A Storage.Market struct with the current state of the market                   - The current estimated interest index                   - The current token price                   - The current market interest rate

devdoc.title: Getters

getAccountBalances((address,uint256)).notice: Get an account's summary for each market.

getAccountPar((address,uint256),uint256).notice: Get the principal value for a particular account and market.

getAccountStatus((address,uint256)).notice: Get the status of an account (Normal, Liquidating, or Vaporizing).

getAccountValues((address,uint256)).notice: Get the total supplied and total borrowed value of an account.

getAccountWei((address,uint256),uint256).notice: Get the token balance for a particular account and market.

getAdjustedAccountValues((address,uint25.notice: Get the total supplied and total borrowed values of an account adjusted by the marginPremium of each market. Supplied values are divided by (1 + marginPremium) for each market and borrowed values are multiplied by (1 + marginPremium) for each market. Comparing these adjusted values gives the margin-ratio of the account which will be compared to the global margin-ratio when determining if the account can be liquidated.

getEarningsRate().notice: Get the global earnings-rate variable that determines what percentage of the interest paid by borrowers gets passed-on to suppliers.

getIsGlobalOperator(address).notice: Return true if a particular address is approved as a global operator. Such an address can act on any account as if it were the operator's own.

getIsLocalOperator(address,address).notice: Return true if a particular address is approved as an operator for an owner's accounts. Approved operators can act on the accounts of the owner as if it were the operator's own.

getLiquidationSpread().notice: Get the global liquidation spread. This is the spread between oracle prices that incentivizes the liquidation of risky positions.

getLiquidationSpreadForPair(uint256,uint.notice: Get the adjusted liquidation spread for some market pair. This is equal to the global liquidation spread multiplied by (1 + spreadPremium) for each of the two markets.

getMarginRatio().notice: Get the global minimum margin-ratio that every position must maintain to prevent being liquidated.

getMarket(uint256).notice: Get basic information about a particular market.

getMarketCachedIndex(uint256).notice: Get the most recently cached interest index for a market.

getMarketCurrentIndex(uint256).notice: Get the interest index for a market if it were to be updated right now.

getMarketInterestRate(uint256).notice: Get the current borrower interest rate for a market.

getMarketInterestSetter(uint256).notice: Get the interest-setter address for a market.

getMarketIsClosing(uint256).notice: Return true if a particular market is in closing mode. Additional borrows cannot be taken from a market that is closing.

getMarketMarginPremium(uint256).notice: Get the margin premium for a market. A margin premium makes it so that any positions that include the market require a higher collateralization to avoid being liquidated.

getMarketPrice(uint256).notice: Get the price of the token for a market.

getMarketPriceOracle(uint256).notice: Get the price oracle address for a market.

getMarketSpreadPremium(uint256).notice: Get the spread premium for a market. A spread premium makes it so that any liquidations that include the market have a higher spread than the global default.

getMarketTokenAddress(uint256).notice: Get the ERC20 token address for a market.

getMarketTotalPar(uint256).notice: Get the total principal amounts (borrowed and supplied) for a market.

getMarketWithInfo(uint256).notice: Get comprehensive information about a particular market.

getMinBorrowedValue().notice: Get the global minimum-borrow value which is the minimum value of any new borrow on Solo.

getNumExcessTokens(uint256).notice: Get the number of excess tokens for a market. The number of excess tokens is calculated by taking the current number of tokens held in Solo, adding the number of tokens owed to Solo by borrowers, and subtracting the number of tokens owed to suppliers by Solo.

getNumMarkets().notice: Get the total number of markets.

getRiskLimits().notice: Get all risk parameter limits in a single struct. These are the maximum limits at which the risk parameters can be set by the admin of Solo.

getRiskParams().notice: Get all risk parameters in a single struct.
